message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SD 

This paper focuses on text classification and Natural Language Processing (NLP), which are core topics in the computer science sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also explores neural architectures for CLTC, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of embeddings for text classification, which is relevant to the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also addresses the issue of the emerging AI divide, which is a topic in the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with social media data, which is relevant to the sub-category of cs.SD (Social and Information Networks).
